name: bas-mini-app-nodejs-sdk
description: A Node client SDK for interacting with basgate's Mini App on basgate

scripts.docs: .\node_modules\.bin\jsdoc package.json index.js clients lib config README.md -d docs
scripts.docs2: rm -rf ./docs && ./node_modules/.bin/jsdoc package.json index.js clients/** lib/** config/** README.md -d docs
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run docs

author: basgate
